definition: wff A! x e. A ph
remarks:
Extend wff definition to include "all some" applied to a class, which means ` ph ` is true for all ` x ` in ` A ` , and there is at least one ` x ` in ` A ` .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Oct-2018.) 

---

This syntax is primitive. The first axiom using it is #P_df-alsi|NAV_LINK|HIDE_TVI.

---
